Before you even download this, save your time by:

1.  Learning what CFW is.
2.  Learning how to unpack archives.

Once you do that and have a CFW on your PSP, come back here and ask for help.  But please don't waste yours and our time by asking how to use this on an unmodded PSP or what to do with the archived files.
